divs: Sighting Details wentout to have a smoke was on the phonelooked up saw the craft,i thought it was a plane on fire but it wasnt it ahd aglowe on its underbelly that kind of faded in and out i ran in to get mydaughter as it got higher in altitude,my daughter saw it too it seemed at timesto stay in one spot and then my daughter went back in i continued to watch itand then it was pretty high up and it looked as if something ejected from thecraft or it could have been some kind of exhaust then it was gone completely(youcan type over these instructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words(equivalent to 1 typed page).
Summary: Spotted one in San Diego, glowing bottom.
